[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Section” _builder_version=”4.0.6″ background_color=”#eeeeee” background_image=”https://www.himjobs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/bkgd-hrd-blue.jpg” global_module=”449″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Contact Us” _builder_version=”4.0.6″ text_font=”|300||on|||||” text_font_size=”40px” background_layout=”dark”]

Contact Us

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]

Refer a Friend

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]We have worked hard to develop honest and long-term relationships with both our candidates and clients alike.  Thus we frequently receive referrals- as talented HIM professionals often know other talented HIM professionals.

The finest compliment we can receive is an introduction to friends or colleagues from a professional peer.  So if you refer someone that we ultimately place, we will send you a check to more than cover your next year’s AHIMA professional dues!

We respect your referrals privacy and will only use this information for professional purposes.  
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_contact_form use_spam_service=”on” recaptcha_list=”HIM Jobs|HIM Jobs-0″ email=”careersenq@gmail.com”
